item.title: (2024.08.07) Publishing Japanese MLOps Book

item.title: (2024.07.15) Accepted at INLG 2024
item.description:
Happy to share that our paper has been accepted at INLG 2024.

Shotaro Ishihara and Hiromu Takahashi (2024). Quantifying Memorization and Detecting Training Data of Pre-trained Language Models using Japanese Newspaper. In Proceedings of the 17th International Natural Language Generation Conference.

「巨人の肩の上」で自作ライブラリを作る技術.

item.title: (2024.05.22) Accepted at Journal of Natural Language Processing
item.description:
Happy to share that our paper has been accepted at the Journal of Natural Language Processing.

澤田悠冶, 安井雄一郎, 大内啓樹, 渡辺太郎, 石井昌之, 石原祥太郎, 山田剛, 進藤裕之 (2024). 企業名の類似度に基づく日経企業IDリンキングシステムの構築と分析. 自然言語処理, 2024, 31巻, 3号.

Happy to share that our paper has been accepted at the TrustNLP workshop at NAACL2024.
